1. Financial assistance will be given for all or any of the items listed below:


 - Normally up to 25% of total Govt. grant may be utilized for Maintenance (Salary of staff, Office Expenses, Miscellaneous Expenses) and Construction/Repairs/Extension/Restoration/Renovation of the Building of the Institute/Organization/Culture focused on promotion of Art &amp; Culture. 
 - Normally up to 75% of the total Govt.
